input_email_body:
Subject: Support Request for Data Analysis Performance Issues

Hello, we are encountering performance issues with our data analysis processes. Initial troubleshooting steps such as restarting devices and updating software applications were unsuccessful You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.. Could you assist in identifying the root cause and implementing a solution to improve performance? For better understanding, please provide details on the specific hardware and software configurations. My name is John Doe.
